body:
## What happened

I have upgraded flutter to new version and updated the android studios plugins and IDE. I have got IDE error with NullPointerException.

## Version information

Android Studio `Bumblebee | 2021.1.1 Patch 1` • Flutter plugin `io.flutter 64.1.2`

Flutter 3.0.0 • channel stable • https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git
Framework • revision ee4e09cce0 (2 days ago) • 2022-05-09 16:45:18 -0700
Engine • revision d1b9a6938a
Tools • Dart 2.17.0 • DevTools 2.12.2

## Exception

null


comment_data.body: Your Flutter plugin for Android Studio is out-of-date. Please update it and see if that fixes the problem.

I have a theory that this particular error occurs after the Dart plugin is updated but the IDE is not immediately restarted. Let us know if the problem occurs after updating the Flutter plugin and restarting the IDE.

Without additional information we're not able to resolve this issue, so it will be closed at this time. You're still free to add more info and respond to any questions above, though. We'll reopen the case if you do. Thanks for your contribution!

title: Got NullPointerException when updating Android Studio IDE.
